feed.title: Invoice Ninja Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.69
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Disable updateAccount() methods to preserve rate limits - Nordigen
  • Fixes for company observer checks
  • Updated domain blacklists
  • Fixes for braintree level 2 props
  • Fixes for statements when viewing a client with no invoics
  • Fixes for middle ware props causing a regression for document downloads
  • v5.11.69 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10910

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.68...v5.11.69

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.70
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Adjustments for Importing Forte CSG customers
  • Change permission structure for creating new companies to Owner User Only
  • Static analysis fixes
  • v5.11.70 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10921

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.69...v5.11.70

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.71
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for admin notifications for Quote Reminders
  • Fixes for Forte CSG customer imports
  • Fixes for Mollie idempotency hash
  • Push validation fixes for payment date
  • v5.11.71 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10926

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.70...v5.11.71

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.72
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Refactor to make the company phone number the default contact
  • Merge branch 'v5-develop' of https://github.com/turbo124/invoiceninja …
  • Fixes for undefined array key 'message' error with postmark
  • Refactor for nordigen to drastically reduce the meagre number of allo…
  • Refactor for document / file validation
  • Refactor for update entities, remove 'documents' validation
  • Fixes for tests
  • Fixes for updateclientrequest
  • Updates for logging
  • v5.11.72 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10929

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.71...v5.11.72

entry.title: New release for Invoice Ninja: v5.11.73
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixes for chunked upload security
  • Updated blacklist domains by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10931
  • Enhance payment status handling to include confirmed payments by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10934
  • Improve error message for missing Blockonomics callback URL by @cnohall in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10935
  • v5.11.73 by @turbo124 in https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/pull/10950

Full Changelog: https://github.com/invoiceninja/invoiceninja/compare/v5.11.72...v5.11.73
